title: More Information
content:
If you want to learn more about the topic of breast cancer, you can do some reading on the following websites:

https://www.breastcancer.org/
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/breast-cancer/
https://www.bcrf.org/
shorturl.at/rxN46

title: Credits
content:
This game was created for the online BooBJAM2020 to spread awareness in the research for fighting against breast cancer. The following sources were used for audio assets:

https://www.bfxr.net/
https://soundimage.org/

The game was created by Roger Recaldini (Artist) and Nikolay Ivanov (Programmer) with Love2d and Lua
